properties.description: Run dataflow with Explicit copy to ingest copy source
Connection to your data source store.
Connection to your data destination store.
Connection to your source data store.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DateID as date,
		Date as date,
		Day as string,
		Month as string,
		Year as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> Date
source(output(
		CustomerID as long,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> Customer
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as short,
		OrderDate as date,
		DueDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		Status as short,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		PurchaseOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		ShipMethod as string,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as double,
		TaxAmt as double,
		Freight as double,
		TotalDue as double,
		Comment as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SOH
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		OrderQty as short,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as double,
		UnitPriceDiscount as double,
		LineTotal as double,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SOD
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		ModelName as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Color as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		ProductCategoryName as string,
		Size as string,
		ListPrice as decimal(8,2),
		StandardCost as decimal(8,2),
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		SellEndDateID as timestamp,
		SellStartDateID as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDateID as timestamp,
		ModifiedDateID as timestamp,
		DescriptionCultureAr as string,
		DescriptionCultureEn as string,
		DescriptionCultureFr as string,
		DescriptionCultureHe as string,
		DescriptionCultureTh as string,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> Product
SOH, Date join(OrderDate == DateID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOrderDate
JoinOrderDate, Customer join(SOH@CustomerID == Customer@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCustomer
JoinCustomer select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDateID = DateID,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate,
		Status,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		CustomerID = Customer@CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = SOH@ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSOH
SelectSOH, Date join(DueDate == DateID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDueDate
JoinDueDate select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDateID,
		DueDateID = DateID,
		ShipDate,
		Status,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSOH1
SelectSOH1, Date join(ShipDate == DateID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinShipDate
JoinShipDate select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDateID,
		DueDateID,
		ShipDateID = DateID,
		Status,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSOH2
SelectSOH2, Date join(ModifiedDate == DateID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinModifiedDate
JoinModifiedDate select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDateID,
		DueDateID,
		ShipDateID,
		Status,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDateID = DateID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSOH3
SOD, Product join(SOD@ProductID == Product@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct
JoinProduct, Date join(ModifiedDate == DateID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDate
JoinDate select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		SalesOrderDetailID,
		OrderQty,
		ProductID = Product@ProductID,
		UnitPrice,
		UnitPriceDiscount,
		LineTotal,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDateID = DateID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSOD
SelectSOH3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		OrderDateID as date,
		DueDateID as date,
		ShipDateID as date,
		ModifiedDateID as date,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		OrderDateID,
		DueDateID,
		ShipDateID,
		ModifiedDateID,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue
	)) ~> sinkSOH
SelectSOD sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		ModifiedDateID as timestamp,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(19,4)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkSOD

transformations.name: MapDriftProduct
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as double,
		ListPrice as double,
		Size as string,
		Weight as double,
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as date,
		SellEndDate as date,
		DiscontinuedDate as date,
		ThumbNailPhoto as string,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Product
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductCategory
source(output(
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Description as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductDescription
source(output(
		ProductModelID as integer,
		Name as string,
		CatalogDescription as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductModel
source(output(
		ProductModelID as integer,
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Culture as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductModelProductDescription
source(output(
		Column_1 as integer,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Address
source(output(
		Column_1 as integer,
		Column_2 as boolean,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customer
source(output(
		CustomerID as long,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimCustomer
source(output(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimAddress
ProductModelProductDescription, ProductDescription join(ProductModelProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID == ProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProdDescandProdModProdDesc
Product, ProductCategory join(Product@ProductCategoryID == ProductCategory@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProdandProdCat
ProductModel, JoinProdandProdCat join(ProductModel@ProductModelID == Product@ProductModelID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProdModandProdProdCat
JoinProdModandProdProdCat, JoinProdDescandProdModProdDesc join(ProductModel@ProductModelID == ProductModelProductDescription@ProductModelID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct
JoinProduct select(mapColumn(
		ProductModelID = ProductModel@ProductModelID,
		ProductDescriptionID = ProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID,
		ProductCategoryID = Product@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductID,
		ProductModelID = ProductModel@ProductModelID,
		ModelName = ProductModel@Name,
		CatalogDescription,
		ProductName = Product@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		SellStartDateID = SellStartDate,
		SellEndDateID = SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDateID = DiscontinuedDate,
		ModifiedDateID = Product@ModifiedDate,
		ProductCategoryName = ProductCategory@Name,
		Culture,
		Description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProduct
SelectProduct pivot(groupBy(Description),
	pivotBy(Culture),
	DescriptionCulture = max(Description),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> PivotProduct
PivotProduct derive(DescriptionCultureAr = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturear    ')),
		DescriptionCultureEn = toString(byName('DescriptionCultureen    ')),
		DescriptionCultureFr = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturefr    ')),
		DescriptionCultureHe = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturehe    ')),
		DescriptionCultureTh = toString(byName('DescriptionCultureth    ')),
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturezh-cht'))) ~> MapDriftProduct
MapDriftProduct, SelectProduct join(PivotProduct@Description == SelectProduct@Description,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct1
JoinProduct1 aggregate(groupBy(ProductID),
	DescriptionCultureAr = max(DescriptionCultureAr),
		{DescriptionCultureEn    } = max(DescriptionCultureEn),
		{DescriptionCultureFr   } = max(DescriptionCultureFr),
		DescriptionCultureHe = max(DescriptionCultureHe),
		DescriptionCultureTh = max(DescriptionCultureTh),
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = max({DescriptionCultureZh-cht})) ~> AggProdDesc
AggProdDesc, SelectProduct join(AggProdDesc@ProductID == SelectProduct@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct2
JoinProduct2 select(mapColumn(
		ProductID = SelectProduct@ProductID,
		ProductModelID,
		ProductDescriptionID,
		DescriptionCultureAr,
		{DescriptionCultureEn    },
		{DescriptionCultureFr   },
		DescriptionCultureHe,
		DescriptionCultureTh,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht},
		ProductCategoryID,
		ModelName,
		ProductName,
		ProductCategoryName,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		Size,
		ListPrice,
		StandardCost,
		Weight,
		SellStartDateID,
		SellEndDateID,
		DiscontinuedDateID,
		ModifiedDateID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProduct2
SelectProduct2 aggregate(groupBy(ProductID,
		ProductModelID,
		ProductCategoryID,
		ModelName,
		ProductName,
		Color,
		ProductNumber,
		ProductCategoryName,
		Size,
		ListPrice,
		StandardCost,
		Weight,
		SellEndDateID,
		SellStartDateID,
		DiscontinuedDateID,
		ModifiedDateID),
	DescriptionCultureAr = max(DescriptionCultureAr),
		{DescriptionCultureEn    } = max({DescriptionCultureEn    }),
		{DescriptionCultureFr    } = max({DescriptionCultureFr   }),
		DescriptionCultureHe = max(DescriptionCultureHe),
		DescriptionCultureTh = max(DescriptionCultureTh),
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = max({DescriptionCultureZh-cht})) ~> AggProduct
Customer select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = Column_1,
		NameStyle = Column_2,
		Title = Column_3,
		FirstName = Column_4,
		MiddleName = Column_5,
		LastName = Column_6,
		Suffix = Column_7,
		CompanyName = Column_8,
		SalesPerson = Column_9,
		EmailAddress = Column_10,
		Phone = Column_11,
		PasswordHash = Column_12,
		PasswordSalt = Column_13,
		ModifiedDate = Column_14
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCustomer
SelectCustomer derive(HashKey = sha2(256, iifNull(Title,'') +FirstName +iifNull(MiddleName,'') +LastName +iifNull(Suffix,'') +iifNull(CompanyName,'') +iifNull(SalesPerson,'') +iifNull(EmailAddress,'') +iifNull(Phone,''))) ~> CreateCustomerHash
CreateCustomerHash, DimCustomer exists(CreateCustomerHash@HashKey == DimCustomer@HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists, DimCustomer lookup(SelectCustomer@CustomerID == DimCustomer@CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCustomerID
LookupCustomerID derive(ModifiedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetDates
SetDates alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AllowUpserts
SelectAddress derive(HashKey = sha2(256,AddressLine1 +iifNull(AddressLine2,'') +iifNull(City,'') +iifNull(StateProvince,'') +iifNull(CountryRegion,'') +iifNull(PostalCode,''))) ~> CreateAddressHash
Address select(mapColumn(
		AddressID = Column_1,
		AddressLine1 = Column_2,
		AddressLine2 = Column_3,
		City = Column_4,
		StateProvince = Column_5,
		CountryRegion = Column_6,
		PostalCode = Column_7,
		ModifiedDate = Column_8
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAddress
Exists1, DimAddress lookup(SelectAddress@AddressID == DimAddress@AddressID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupAddressID
CreateAddressHash, DimAddress exists(CreateAddressHash@HashKey == DimAddress@HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
LookupAddressID derive(ModifiedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetDatesAddress
SetDatesAddress alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AllowUpsert
AggProduct sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ProductID as integer,
		ModelName as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Color as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		ProductCategoryName as string,
		Size as string,
		ListPrice as decimal(8,2),
		StandardCost as decimal(8,2),
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		SellEndDateID as timestamp,
		SellStartDateID as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDateID as timestamp,
		ModifiedDateID as timestamp,
		DescriptionCultureAr as string,
		DescriptionCultureEn as string,
		DescriptionCultureFr as string,
		DescriptionCultureHe as string,
		DescriptionCultureTh as string,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		ModelName,
		ProductName,
		Color,
		ProductNumber,
		ProductCategoryName,
		Size,
		ListPrice,
		StandardCost,
		Weight,
		SellEndDateID,
		SellStartDateID,
		DiscontinuedDateID,
		ModifiedDateID,
		DescriptionCultureAr,
		DescriptionCultureEn = {DescriptionCultureEn    },
		DescriptionCultureFr = {DescriptionCultureFr    },
		DescriptionCultureHe,
		DescriptionCultureTh,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht}
	)) ~> SinkProductDimension
AllowUpserts sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CustomerID as long,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SelectCustomer@CustomerID,
		Title = SelectCustomer@Title,
		FirstName = SelectCustomer@FirstName,
		MiddleName = SelectCustomer@MiddleName,
		LastName = SelectCustomer@LastName,
		Suffix = SelectCustomer@Suffix,
		CompanyName = SelectCustomer@CompanyName,
		SalesPerson = SelectCustomer@SalesPerson,
		EmailAddress = SelectCustomer@EmailAddress,
		Phone = SelectCustomer@Phone,
		PasswordHash = SelectCustomer@PasswordHash,
		PasswordSalt = SelectCustomer@PasswordSalt,
		ModifiedDate,
		HashKey = CreateCustomerHash@HashKey
	)) ~> Sink
AllowUpsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['AddressID'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		AddressID = SelectAddress@AddressID,
		AddressLine1 = SelectAddress@AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2 = SelectAddress@AddressLine2,
		City = SelectAddress@City,
		StateProvince = SelectAddress@StateProvince,
		CountryRegion = SelectAddress@CountryRegion,
		PostalCode = SelectAddress@PostalCode,
		ModifiedDate,
		HashKey = CreateAddressHash@HashKey
	)) ~> sink1
